Name: Roxy
Description: Roxy has always been an avid gamer all her life. She grew up with a competitive streak and always sought the rush videogames has provided her. Moving from mobile games to consoles, to PCs, and even VR she has always tried to find a new medium in which to explore her greatest passion, Videogames. The founder discovered Roxy after hearing of her prowess and skill, before he could even finish offering her a place on the gameshow, her bag was already packed and she was set to go.
